tags.name: Not Documented API - InProgress or Stuck

post.description: This Api is using only for developing mode, for registration of our Board - in future it will be used only by machine in factory or boards themselves with "registration procedure". Its not allowed to delete that! Only deactivate. Classic User can registed that to own project or own account

400.description: Objects not found - details in message

delete.description: Permanent exclusion from the system - for some reason it is not allowed to remove the Board from database

400.description: Objects not found - details in message

put.description: Get List of boards. Acording by permission - system return only hardware from project, where is user owner or all boards if user have static Permission key

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: page_number is Integer. Contain  1,2...n. For first call, use 1

put.description: Used for add descriptions by owners. "Persons" who registred "Board" to own "Projec"

400.description: Some Json value Missing

get.description: if you want get Board object by query = board_id. User can get only boards from project, whitch user owning or user need Permission key "Board_rea".

400.description: Objects not found - details in message

delete.description: This Api is used by Users for disconnection of Board from their Project, its not meaning that Board is removed from system, only disconnect and another user can registred that (connect that with different account/project etc..)

400.description: Objects not found - details in message

x-permission_description.Board_Disconnection: read: If user want remove Board from Project, he needs one single permission Project.update_permission, where hardware is registered. - Or user need static/dynamic permission key

put.description: This Api is used by Users for connection of Board with their Project

400.description: Objects not found - details in message

x-permission_description.Board_Connection: read: If user want connect Project with board, he needs two Permission! Project.update_permission == true and also Board.first_connect_permission == true. - Or user need combination of static/dynamic permission key and Board.first_connect_permission == true

post.summary: update Embedded Hardware with  binary file
post.description: Upload Binary file and choose hardware_id for update. Result (HTML code) will be every time 200. - Its because upload, restart, etc.. operation need more than ++30 second There is also problem / chance that Tyrion didn't find where Embedded hardware is. So you have to listening Server Sent Events (SSE) and show "future" message to the user!

400.description: External cloud_blocko_server where is hardware is offline

put.summary: update Embedded Hardware with C_program compilation
put.description: Upload compilation to list of hardware. Compilation is on Version oc C_program. And before uplouding compilation, you must succesfuly compile required version before! Result (HTML code) will be every time 200. - Its because upload, restart, etc.. operation need more than ++30 second There is also problem / chance that Tyrion didn't find where Embedded hardware is. So you have to listening Server Sent Events (SSE) and show "future" message to the user!

put.description:
If you want get all or only some SingleLibraries you can use filter parameters in Json. But EveryTime i will return maximal 25 objects 

so, you have to used that limit for frontend pagination -> first round (0,25), second round (26, 50) etc... I will give you alsoinformation how many results you can show

post.description: Create type of screen - its used for describe Grid dimensions for regular users - (Iphone 5, Samsung Galaxy S3 etc..). x-permission_description.Screen_Size_Type.create_permission: create: User can create Screen_Size_Type only on own Project (Project.update_permission = true) - Its private object shared in Project - Or user can create public object for everyone but static/dynamic permission key is required - "Screen_Size_Type_create"

get.description:
For login via Facebook 

 If you want login to system with social networks - you can used Facebook, GitHub, Twitter... api just ask via this Api and cloud_blocko_server responds with object where is token and redirection link. After that redirect user to this link and after returning to your success page you have to ask again (api - get Person by token ) for information about logged Person

parameters.name: return_link
parameters.description: this is return url address in format  ?return_link=/link/link

400.description: Some Json value Missing

get.description:
For login via GitHub 

 If you want login to system with social networks - you can used Facebook, GitHub, Twitter... api just ask via this Api and cloud_blocko_server responds with object where is token and redirection link. After that redirect user to this link and after returning to your success page you have to ask again (api - get Person by token ) for information about logged Person

parameters.name: return_link
parameters.description: this is return url address in format  /link/link

get.summary: get Person by token (after Oauth2 Login -> Facebook, GitHub, Twitter)
get.description: If you want login to system with social networks - you can used facebook, github or twitter api just ask for token, cloud_blocko_server responds with object where is token and redirection link. Redirect user to this link and after returning to success page that you filled in ask for token, ask again to this api and cloud_blocko_server respond with Person Object and with Roles and Permissions lists

get.description:
Get list of latest user notifications. Server return maximum 25 latest objects.

x-permission_description.Private_Homer_Server.create_permission: Its not allowed to create Homer by user. Homer (installed on PC or created in cloud) must build itself in DB - there are private APIs for Homer-Js! User can only connect this homer with own Project in Homer program (there is Login and buttons for connect to project

put.description: Only for Grid Terminals! Before when you want connect terminal (grid) application with Tyrion throw WebSocker. You need unique identification key. If Person loggs to you application Tyrion connects this device with Person. Try to save this key to cookies or on mobile device, or you have to ask every time again

Boards_For_Blocko.description: Json Model for Blocko in Becki for accessible hardware and firmware versions

message.description: Can be null! If not, you can show that to User

LibraryGroup_Version.description: Json Model for new Version for LibraryGroup

name.description: The name must have at least 3 characters. Must be unique if its not private!

project_id.description: When you want create private screen

ScreeSizeType_New.description: Json Model for new Scree Size Type

ShareProject_Person.description: Json Model for sharing project with Persons

items.$ref: #/definitions/Person permission static key object with description

valid.description: Entity (Email, NickName.. etc) is valid if valid = true

message.description: If valid = false, Json probably contains message for user

Entity_Validation.description: Json Model for Validation of *-some Entity

first_connect_permission.description: It will be visible in Json object, only if value is true. This is an extraordinary value

description.description: The description must have at least 24 characters

group_name.description: The name must have at least 8 characters

name.description: The name must have at least 8 characters

description.description: The description must have at least 10 characters

connectible_to_internet.description: If device can connect to internet

authToken.description: X-AUTH-TOKEN - used this token in HTML head for verifying the identities

Login_Token.description: Json Model that you will get, if login was successful

version_code.description: Code in Json - same structure like when user saved that!

C_Program_Version.description: Json Model for Version of C_program

mac_address.description: Required unique value - its MacAddress of Homer

project_id.description: Required if user want used Homer with project

Login.description: Json Model for new Basic Login

redirect_url.description: URL that you have to redirect user

authToken.description: token, that you have to used in HTML head for verifying the identities

Social_Login.description: Json Model for new Basic Login throw the social networks

description.description: The description must have at least 24 characters

processor_code.description: The Processor Code must have at least 4 characters

processor_name.description: The Processor name must have at least 4 characters

hardware_unique_ids.description: Must be unique!!!, The hardware_id must have 8 hexadecimal characters!

Board_New.description: Json Model for create new Board

message.description: Can be null! If not, you can show that to User

Permission Required.description: Some Json value missing - don't show that to users.. SERVER IS LOGGING THIS FRONTEND ISSUE

C_Program_Version_Edit.description: Json Model for edit basic information of C_program Version

value.description: Set type of Order -> ascending / descending, If you used order - its required!!!

SingleLibrary_Version.description: Json Model for new Version for SingleLibrary

project_id.description: This value will be in Json only if TypeOfBlock is private!

Board_Personal_Description.description: Json Model for update personal description of Board

project_name.description: The name must have at least 8 characters, must be unique!

project_description.description: The description must have at least 24 characters

Project_New.description: Json Model for new General Project

message.description: Can be null! If not, you can show that to User. Server fills the message only when it is important.

Result ok.description: Some Json value missing - don't show that to users..

from.description: First value position from all subjects. Minimum is 0.

pages.description: Numbers of pages, which you can call

Json_Value_Missing_Result.description: Some Json value missing - don't show that to users.. SERVER IS LOGGING THIS FRONTEND ISSUE

from.description: First value position from all subjects. Minimum is 0.

pages.description: Numbers of pages, which you can call

general_description.description: The description must have at least 8 characters

project_id.description: if you want make private TypeOfBlock group. You have to have "project_id" parameter in Json.
enum: Value can be null or contains project_id

name.description: The name must have at least 8 characters

text_of_post.description: The text must have at least 24 characters
The text of post must have at least 4 characters

message.description: Can be null! If not, you can show that to User

External cloud_blocko_server is offline.description: External servers (compilation, blocko cloud_blocko_server etc.) are offline

from.description: First value position from all subjects. Minimum is 0.

pages.description: Numbers of pages, which you can call

value.description: Set type of Order -> ascending / descending, If you used order - its required!!!

permissions.description: List of all person permission (private and all collections from Person Roles ("SecurityRole")

Login_Result.description: Json Model that you will get, if login was successful

m_code.description: Visible here only when the object IS specifically required. Inversion value for "m_code_url" THIS or THAT!

m_code_id.description: Visible here only when the object is NOT specifically required. Inversion value for "m_code"

websocket_address.description: Its here only if its possible to connect to B_Program

message.description: Can be null! If not, you can show that to User

Object not found.description: Called object is missing. You can show that to Person

board_id.description: TypeofBoard of this Board must be connectible_to_internet = true

from.description: First value position from all subjects. Minimum is 0.

pages.description: Numbers of pages, which you can call

main_board.description: This board must be connectible_to_internet = true! (Its out Yoda)

B_Program_Version_New.description: Json Model for new Version of B_Program

SingleLibrary_New.description: Json Model for new Single Library

List of Boards.description: Json Model with List of Board ID

BlockoBlock_BlockoVersion_New.description: Json Model for crating new version and also content of BlockoBlock Model

version_name.description: The name must have at least 8 characters

C_Program_Version_New.description: Json Model for new Version of C_Program

type_of_board_id.description: Required only if user compile code not under C++ code version (where compilation can found type_of_board)

C_Program_Version_Update.description: Json Model for new Version of C_Program

TypeOfPost_New.description: Json Model for create new TypeOfPost

name.description: The name must have at least 8 characters

general_description.description: The name must have at least 24 characters

BlockoBlock_New.description: Json Model for crating new BlockoBlock Model

c_program_detail.description: Is visible only if user send compilation under C_program in system  ( OR state for binary_file)

binary_file_detail.description: Is visible only if user send own binary file ( OR state for c_program_detail)

program_name.description: The description must have at least 8 characters

height_lock.description: If true - its possible turn on that on height

width_lock.description: If true - its possible turn on that on width

Person_Update.description: Json Model for update Person. (For password or email, you have to used separate API)

text_of_post.description: The text of post must have at least 4 characters

name.description: The name must have at least 4 characters, must be unique!

description.description: The description must have at least 8 characters

from.description: First value position from all subjects. Minimum is 0.

pages.description: Numbers of pages, which you can call

name.description: Only if Post is Main (not answers or comments)

comments.description: Only if Post is Main or Answare

nick_name.description: The nick_name must have at least 8 characters

password.description: The password must have at least 8 characters

Person_New.description: Json Model for creating new Person

server_name.description: Unique name For Compiler cloud_blocko_server, The name must have at least 6 characters

Compilation_Server.description: Json Model for new Compilation Server

actual_program.description: It in Object only if user upload own binary firmware to hardware and cloud_blocko_server used file name for naming of this valueIf user used classic build with Byzance - its not visible in Json!

Board_status.description: Json Model for Status and all information about embedded Hardware
